# Pix.js sdk

Pix.js is a set of tools for integrating PIX payments into your JavaScript/TypeScript projects

## Pix Qrcode

### Installation
Source: https://pix-js.vercel.app/docs/getting-started/qrcode
Description: Learn how to install the QRCode package and use it to generate, validate and parse pix qrcodes

To install the QRCode package, you can use your favorite package manager:

```bash tab="npm"
npm install @pix.js/qrcode
```

```bash tab="pnpm"
pnpm add @pix.js/qrcode
```

```bash tab="yarn"
yarn add @pix.js/qrcode
```

```bash tab="bun"
bun add @pix.js/qrcode
```
